contest-event.event-date:
April 29, 2012 D SCABA Spring Contest (Championship Section)
SCABA Spring Contest (Championship Section) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SCABA Spring Contest scaba-spring-contest
The Hawth, Crawley, West Sussex Friary played Elgar Variations (Ellerby), Brass A Musica played Resurgam. Friary won prizes for best March, best instrumentalist (Chris Straker - Euphonium) and best bass section
Oct. 10, 2011, 7:31 p.m. April 30, 2012, 10:14 a.m.
1 Friary Brass Band Melvin White Elgar Variations
2 Brass a Musica Michael Dils Resurgam
